description:
Shareaza is a very powerful multi-network peer-to-peer file-sharing client supporting Gnutella² G2, Gnutella, eDonkey2000 / eMule, DC++, HTTP, FTP and BitTorrent / DHT protocols for Windows or Wine.

[Features](http://shareaza.sourceforge.net/?id=tour)
[Forum](http://shareaza.sourceforge.net/phpbb/)
[Wiki](http://shareaza.sourceforge.net/mediawiki/)
summary: A universal P2P file sharing client
author: Nikolay Raspopov
